name: 結華
text: ほら、あっち──\nあの家のとこ……！
trans:
Look, it's up over there──
Floating by that house...!

name: 結華
text: ……あ～っ、間に合わないか……！？\nあれもう飛んでっちゃう……！？
trans:
...Awww, are we too late to grab it down... !?
Is it already being blown away again...!?

name: 霧子
text: もう……木とかもないし……\n──あ……
trans:
And there's no more trees it could get caught in... 
Ah...

name: 結華
text: 行っちゃったかぁ\n──さらばっ、よい旅を……！
trans:
Well, off it goes.
──Farewell, and safe travels...!

name: 結華
text: あははっ\nなんか、見送っちゃったね
trans:
Ahahah.
It's like we saw it off.

name: 霧子
text: きっと……\n他にも誰か……見送ってるね……
trans: I'm sure... someone else... made sure to see it off, too...

name: 霧子
trans: Whoever... let the balloon... fly away...

name: 結華
text: ──ふふ\nじゃあ、悲しくないといいね
trans:
──Heheh.
Well, I hope they aren't too sad.

name: 結華
text: ……あれっ？\n風船飛ばしちゃった人、悲しくないといいなって
trans: ...Um? I was just, hoping that whoever lost their balloon isn't too sad about it.

name: 霧子
text: お誕生会とかの……\n楽しい風船さんかなって……
trans: I was thinking that it was a happy balloon... Set free a birthday party, maybe...

name: 結華
text: あーそっか！　確かに！\n飛んでけー！　ってされたやつかもしれないもんね
trans: Oh, yeah! For sure! Like from when they release a bunch of balloons into the sky at events and stuff.

name: 霧子
text: 飛ばしちゃって……\n悲しい人が……いるのかも……
trans:
Now that you mention it, there could be someone...
Sad to have lost it... out there too...

name: 結華
text: どっちにしても、\nもうあんなになっちゃった……！
trans:
Well, in either case.
What's done is done...!

name: 結華
text: ──空の空かぁ\nきりりん、素敵な言い方するんだから
trans:
──The sky across the sky, huh.
You have a lovely way of phrasing things, Kiririn.

name: 霧子
trans:
...Ah!
I don't know if I'd call it... lovely...

name: 結華
text: ううん。おんなじとこ見てるのに、\nもしかして違って見えてるのかなーって思ったもん
trans: It's true, though. Even when we're looking at the same thing, I always feel like you might be seeing something totally different.

name: 結華
text: 三峰より、もっと綺麗なもの見えてるのかなーって
trans: I think you might able to see a much more beautiful world than Mitsumine can.

name: 霧子
trans:
──May I see your glasses...
For a moment...?

name: 霧子
text: あのね……こうしたら……\n見えないかな……って……
trans:
Um... I thought this way...
Maybe you could see it...

name: 霧子
trans: Maybe, you could see the sky... that I see...

name: 霧子
text: それから……\n結華ちゃんの……空……
trans:
And I could see... 
The sky that you see, Yuika...

name: 霧子
trans: Yes... I want to see it...

name: 霧子
trans: A sky that's... Always there for someone who's sad...

name: 霧子
text: 空……じゃなくて……\n結華ちゃん……だったかも……
trans:
I think maybe, it wasn't the sky I saw...
It was just you... Yuika...

name: 結華
text: それは残念\n三峰、空は見せられなかったかぁ……！
trans:
That's too bad.
Mitsumine couldn't show your her sky...!

name: 霧子
text: ううん──\n空みたいな……結華ちゃん……
trans:
No, but──
I saw Yuika... Who's exactly like that kind sky...

name: 霧子
trans: Yuika, could you see my sky...?

name: 結華
text: 三峰も、きりりんが見えたかも
trans: Mitsumine might've just seen Kiririn, too.

name: 結華
text: ふふっ\n綺麗な綺麗な、きりりんが
trans:
Heheh. 
I saw a pretty, very pretty, Kiririn!

name: 霧子
trans: I couldn't... show you my sky...!

name: 霧子
text: 優しいとこに……飛んでってね……\n風船さん……────
trans:
May you fly away... to somewhere kind, too...
Mr. Balloon──
